summary: This mod provides new HD lip tintmasks for human and elf races which give them a fresh, young,natural and slightly shiny look which can provide every female character with really seductive lips. It is compatible with all kinds of female face textures - modded as well as vanilla.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://imgur.com/1NNxV][img]http://i.imgur.com/1NNxVl.jpg[/img][/url]

About the Mod

The lips of a woman are a true miracle - they keep a promise as well as a secret, they show emotions, can be a tool of sheer beauty and seduction.
In my constant struggle to create more beauty for my personal Skyrim experience I have created new HD lip tintmasks for human and elf races which give them a fresh, young,natural and slightly shiny look which can provide every female character with really seductive lips. To get a feeling fo the effects this mod provides please check out the image section.


Required Mods

No mods are required for my work. It works out well with vanilla and modified textures as well as with custom races like the fabulous Temptress Race by Psychosis and Brokefoot which I currently use my lip textures on.


Installation

Use NMM or put the "Data" folder into your Skyrim directory and say "yes" when being asked to integrate or overwrite files.

If you do a manual installation I HIGHLY RECOMMEND to backup your tintmask folder which usually can be found under Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/textures/character/character assets . This can be done by simply creating a copy of your tintmask folder which you can save somewhere else to be able to revert to your original settings in case you want to do that.

If you want to use my lip textures for your CUSTOM RACE which uses separate textures like the Temptress or Lunari races you will have to put it into the mod specific "tintmasks" folder, e.g. C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatatexturestemptressactorscharacterCharacter assetstintmasks.


Uninstallation

Delete the tintmask folder under Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/textures/character/character assets and the lip textures will automatically revert to vanilla lip textures.
If you have used another mod which changed the look of the lips before installing mine you can just copy the files from your "old" tintmask folder back into it to re-activate the other mod's changes.


Featured in :

- WyldTats Presents The Noiral by Wyldsong - a mystic new race mod, check it out!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24397

navetsea for his fantastic lip textures within the
"CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible" mod which I took as a base for my work.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554

Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit.


Author's note :

First and foremost I have created this little mod for my own purpose, but since I get frequently asked questions about the lip textures of the characters of my other mods or on the images Ioad up I decided to share my work here on the Nexus.

If you like it please endorse, leave a comment or load up a picture - I will really apprechiate it. If you face issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution together.
author: EcthelionOtW
